alert.note: Alert for Southern Seward Peninsula Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 14 at 4:43AM AKST until December 16 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow possible. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches are possible. * WHERE...Southern Seward Peninsula Coast. * WHEN...From Wednesday afternoon through Thursday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting to 45 mph could cause whiteout conditions in blowing snow. Significant drifting of the snow is possible. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow, sleet or ice accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.
